This place doesn't even deserve a star!I can't understand why this place has 4.5 stars on Yelp. Service is so scrambled and unorganized. Food and presentation is below average and it was very pricey. Maillet Chautagne: taste like apple juice with alka seltzer and soda water. This is their sparkling cava? Horrible! $5.5€P Crues vino tinto: this is their best red wine by the glass and it taste like vinegar! $5.9€Escoda wine 2007: good for its vintage $24.60€Burratta Huerta: I could've bought this back home at whole foods market. It's just burratta and tomatoes seasoned with salt. $10.50€Emperador Ahumado: Thinly sliced salted  fish with pomegranate and grapefruit. It was not satisfying. $16€Zamburinas: 6 itsy bitsy scallops the size of the nail bed of my thumb. Salty and sandy! $8.50€Cogollos: grilled romaine lettuce... Tasty? Nope! You should pass on this. $5.50€And of course, Pan. 6 slices of baguette $2€Overall experience, we left hungry and upset. The following day I had a big rash on my arm! Definitely got it after eating there! Never coming back again!
